definition: of or pertaining to the greater gods of ancient Greece whose abode was Mount Olympus, an athlete who participates in the Olympic games
details:
adjective
- of or pertaining to the greater gods of ancient Greece whose abode was Mount Olympus
= example: of or pertaining to the greater gods of ancient Greece whose abode was Mount Olympus
- of the region of Olympia in Greece or its inhabitants
= example: of the region of Olympia in Greece or its inhabitants
= synonyms: Olympic
noun
- an athlete who participates in the Olympic games
